headline: PTC Launches Creo 12 to Accelerate Design Speed, Productivity, and Collaboration
summary: PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) today announced the latest version of its Creo® computer-aided design (CAD) solution, built to help manufacturers deliver their best designs in less time. Creo 12 introduces hundreds of powerful enhancements to its design, simulation, and manufacturing capabilities, enabling teams to work smarter, get more done, and collaborate more effectively.
